content_sections.title:
Bard Prompt Writing Introduction

What is Bard
content_sections.content:
?
Bard is an AI that generates text based on text input.
An example of a text-to-text Generative AI is Bard, developed by Google.
Bard was released as in March 2023.
Bard can be used to:
Understand Text
Create content
Education
Research
Translation
Virtual Assistant
And much, much more!
The process of giving Bard input is known as Prompt Writing, or Prompt Engineering.
General Rules for Prompt Writing
The first prompt provides a starting point or direction for Bard. The response follows the same tone, context, and style as the prompt.
Here are some general rules for writing prompts for Bard:

content_sections.title: Start simple
content_sections.content: - start with a simple prompt and build on it

content_sections.title: Call to Action
content_sections.content: - start the prompt with an action word like "Write", "Create", or "Summarize" instead of "Can you"

content_sections.title: Add Context
content_sections.content: - add specific and relevant context to the task you want to perform

content_sections.title: Add Expectations
content_sections.content:
- add clear and direct expectations for the content, like how long it should be and what to include
Example
With the following prompt:
Create a list of 10 fun and inexpensive toy gifts to programmers based on the following criteria:
- It should be useful
- It should be silly
- It should spark creativity
A response from Bard could be:

★
+1

content_sections.title: Example
content_sections.code:

- It should spark creativity
